title: thunderbird for android

content:
1. how can I use the google (or Samsung) email addressbook in Thunderbird for Android? 2. How can I add more than one email address in an email in thunderbird for android?

I am not a software expert - and don't want to become one - so, please only user-friendly replies and no expert tips...
